message.content:
cs.CL, cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.NE, cs.IR 

This paper is about Natural Language Generation (NLG) using neural approaches, which falls under the category of Computational Linguistics (cs.CL). The paper also discusses the use of supervised learning approaches (CNNs and GBDTs) for classification, which falls under the categories of Artificial Intelligence (cs.AI) and Machine Learning (cs.LG). Additionally, the paper discusses the use of data-driven NLG systems, which falls under the category of Neural Networks (cs.NE). Finally, the paper discusses the classification of responses based on their grammaticality, which falls under the category of Information Retrieval (cs.IR).
